name: The Last Flame (Fatal Studios)
description:
Designed during 2020 Unreal Spring Jam by Anthony Liparulo

---

View in-game key binding menu to see controls

--

A  free-cam procedural 20x20 grid where the only thing between you and the massive snow banks is the last flame. Dig out the snow to reveal resources that will help you stay full, hydrated, and build up a civilization.

Beware, buildings need fire to keep going - don't use up too much of your flame because it doesn't come back.

Use your randomly generated villager to dig snow, rocks, and hopefully uncover something that will save you or most importantly KEEP YOU WARM.
